name: Spirit Of The Treats
description:
Hello, This is my submission for the Mini-Jam 89.

In this game, you take candy by holding the space bar while touching the candy bag. You will collect candy every second you hold the space bar while touching the candy bag. The pumpkins will try to stop you you must avoid them at all cost. Once you have enough candy you can go to the tombstone to beat the level.

The controls are  WASD and the spacebar.

I hope you enjoy my game :D
